attributes.action: force industry to set a standard for all packaging's to be made from the same material
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All packaging’s must, where ever possible be made from the same standard recyclable material. This will cut the costs and energy used to create and recycle this (standard) material. 
Using one type of material for packaging would have many benefits. The most obvious being that the time and energy used in the sorting process and reconstitution would be dramatically reduced.
As standards are set out in chemistry to help with measurements they can also be applied to recycling. We urge the prime minister to promote the idea and practice of the above, not only within the UK but also within the European Union
